title: Water
description: Our bodies are 50-70% water! That makes it a macronutrient (a substance we need to consume a lot of). Drinking enough water consistently will help your heart and bloodflow, help your kidneys remove waste, improve mental/emotional health, increase althletic performance, and a slew of other benefits. You'll definitely want water in your toolbelt for your wellness quest!

title: Screen-Free Time
description: You should strive to get between 2-5 hours of free time per day, but screens shouldn't consume more than 2 of those hours. Making time for screen-free leisure will help you reduce stress, sleep better, improve relationships, and even improve your mood. You can include meal times in this count, or morning/nightly routines. The idea is for you to be more intentional about how you spend your free time, and create space for more than just screen time.
